is shockingly different than its
northern counterpart the biggest ethnic
group in this country of 13 million is
called the Dinka tribe they have
beautiful homogeneous features very tall
skinny and dark and there are mostly
Christians not Muslims like in North
Sudan the people here still live very
simple indigenous lives where owning
cows is just as valuable as money also
in contrast to northern Sudan the nature
here is green and lush with mountains
valleys and of course the stunning Nile
